title: Given a chance
creator_credit: Barwon Youth Employment Office for the Employment Access Program, Community Services Victoria and Clayton Jacobson
brief_description: A program targeting employers, CES, welfare and youth workers assisting disadvantaged youth in the labour market. A positive image of such job seekers is promoted through interviews with young people and employers regarding their success. Provides background information about Victorian Juvenile Justice and Protective Services in relation to employing young people. Explains the role of the Employment Access Program.
